head.title: Remote Learning Updates – Student Services – East Windsor Regional

meta.name: description
meta.content: East Windsor Regional School District is located in Hightstown, NJ.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px

margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px
p.span: Dear EWRSD Community,

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px

margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px
p.span: I hope this email finds you and your families in good health. This serves as a brief update regarding Remote Learning within the East Windsor Regional School District. It was approximately a month ago when our buildings were last filled with students and staff. Since that time, a significant amount of change has occurred as we transitioned to the process of bridging the learning process while students are at home. During this time, our very talented teachers have been working diligently to creatively address the needs of our students. Throughout this new experience, I will continue to express my gratitude to our students, teachers, and families, as we adjust to this temporary mode of learning.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px

margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px
p.span: Naturally, we are all yearning for ways to authentically connect during this time of social distancing. As a school district, we are continuing to explore options that will enable us to celebrate our school community and maintain strong and meaningful relationships between students, teachers, and families. In addition, we are also in the process of developing creative, alternative options for several school-related events that have historically taken place during this time of the year.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px

margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px
p.span: We recognize the recent health crisis has created an abrupt change to our lives, which can contribute to heightened levels of confusion and uncertainty. In an effort to address the ongoing needs of families and students, we have two additions to our district’s website. I encourage families to refer to the
, which contains relevant and up to date information regarding counseling, food service, and social-emotional supports. In addition, we have developed a

site to provide families with guidance and direction regarding the online component of Remote Learning. This site will serve as a help desk, which includes frequently asked questions about Wi-Fi hotspots and the steps required to troubleshoot and replace damaged district-issued Chromebook devices.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px

strong.span: School Closure Extended Through at least May 15, 2020:

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px
p.span: As Governor Murphy announced during his April 16, 2020 Coronavirus Media Briefing, New Jersey schools will remain closed through at least Friday, May 15, 2020. Based on this update, the East Windsor Regional School District will continue with Remote Learning until we receive further direction from Governor Murphy.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px

p.span: Our district continues to offer grab and go breakfast and lunch items for all students on Mondays, Tuesdays, and Fridays from 9:00 to 11:00 a.m. at the following school sites:

p.span: Please note that students/families can receive up to a week’s worth of food. I encourage families to utilize our food service program.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px

margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px

margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px
p.span: If your family is experiencing financial difficulties as a result of the current COVID-19 health crisis, we encourage you to enroll your child(ren) in the Free and Reduced Price School Meals Program, by submitting an application. Please click
to enter the Parent Portal to complete an online application, or click
to access our website that contains additional information regarding the process. For questions, please contact Paul Todd, Business Administrator, at

span.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial

p.span: As previously shared, the current interpretation of our remote learning structure is derived from the policy related to Home Instruction. Therefore, students are considered to be present each day, and evidence of work completion is used to confirm that attendance. However, we recognize that there will be days when students are ill and unable to complete the work assigned by her/his teacher. If this occurs, parents should use the “Attendance” and “Notify Attendance Office” tabs via the

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #333333; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial

font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial

p.span: to submit your child’s attendance. If parents require assistance, please contact your child's school or grade level office. Please click

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: #333333; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial

font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: black; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial

p.span: for additional information.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px

margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; text-align: justify; line-height: normal; background: #fefefe; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px

margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px
p.span: In light of the current COVID-19 related school closure, our faculty and staff will deliver some instruction, counseling, nursing, and related services through real-time, online video conferencing sessions. This platform enables students to receive services and instruction by connecting faculty/staff and students through electronic or virtual means. The method of this instruction/these services will be provided to groups of students, typically your child’s usual class where other students will be able to participate in the instruction and may be able to see/hear interaction involving other students. Although we discourage parent/guardian monitoring of this instruction, please understand that there is a possibility that parents/guardians may disregard our direction. In addition, the recording/picture taking of real-time instruction via video conferencing by students and parents/guardians, without the prior written approval of the school district, is strictly prohibited. Due to the current limitations imposed by the recent COVID-19 related school closure, we believe there are significant benefits regarding the use of real-time video conference instruction/meetings to address the needs of our students. We sincerely hope, considering our current school closure that your child may participate in real-time video conferencing for instruction, counseling, nursing, and related services, and benefit from a virtual connection with his/her teachers, therapists, and school staff. However, if you do not want your child to participate in this form of instruction, counseling, nursing and/or therapy, please notify the district by clicking

p.span: Thank you for your continued support. Stay safe and stay well.

p.span: Estimada Comunidad del Distrito Regional Escolar de East Windsor:

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px
line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Espero que todos ustedes y sus familias se encuentren con buena salud. Les envío una breve actualización sobre el aprendizaje remoto del Distrito Escolar Regional de East Windsor. Fue hace aproximadamente un mes cuando nuestros edificios se llenaron por última vez de estudiantes y personal. Desde ese momento, han ocurrido una cantidad significativa de cambios mientras que conectamos el proceso de aprendizaje cuando los estudiantes están en casa. Durante este tiempo, nuestros maestros talentosos han estado trabajando diligentemente para abordar creativamente las necesidades de nuestros estudiantes. A lo largo de esta nueva experiencia, continuaré expresando mi gratitud a nuestros estudiantes, maestros y familias, mientras nos adaptamos a este modo temporal de aprendizaje.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px
line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Naturalmente, todos anhelamos formas de conectarnos auténticamente durante este tiempo de distanciamiento social. Cómo distrito escolar, continuamos explorando opciones que nos permitirán celebrar nuestra comunidad escolar y mantener conexiones sólidas y significativas entre estudiantes, maestros y familias. Además, también estamos en el proceso de desarrollar opciones creativas y alternativas para varios eventos relacionados con la escuela que históricamente han tenido lugar durante esta época del año.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px
line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Reconocemos que la reciente crisis de salud ha creado un cambio abrupto en nuestras vidas, que puede contribuir a mayores niveles de confusión e incertidumbre. En un esfuerzo por abordar las necesidades continuas de las familias y los estudiantes, tenemos dos adiciones al sitio web de nuestro distrito. Ánimo a las familias a consultar la Guía de Recursos de COVID-19, que contiene información relevante y actualizada sobre asesoramiento, servicio de alimentos y apoyos socioemocionales. Además, hemos desarrollado un sitio de Soporte de Tecnología de Aprendizaje Remoto para proporcionar a las familias orientación y dirección sobre el componente en línea de Aprendizaje Remoto. Este sitio servirá como ayuda, que incluye preguntas frecuentes sobre puntos de acceso Wi-Fi y los pasos necesarios para solucionar problemas y reemplazar los dispositivos o Chromebooks dañados prestados por el distrito.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px
line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: Escuelas Cerradas al menos hasta el 15 de mayo de 2020:

p.style: line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Como anunció el Gobernador Murphy durante su Sesión Informativa de Coronavirus del 16 de abril de 2020, las escuelas de

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

strong.span: Nueva Jersey permanecerán cerradas al menos hasta el viernes 15 de mayo de 2020

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: . Según esta actualización, el Distrito Escolar Regional de East Windsor continuará con el Aprendizaje Remoto hasta que recibamos más dirección del Gobernador Murphy.

line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

p.span: Tenga en cuenta que los estudiantes/familias pueden recibir hasta una semana de comida. Ánimo a las familias a utilizar nuestro programa de servicio de alimentos.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px

p.span: Si su familia está teniendo dificultades financieras como resultado de la crisis de salud actual COVID-19, puede inscribir a su hijo(s) en el Programa de Comidas Escolares Gratuitas o de Precio Reducido, presentando una solicitud. Haga clic

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: para ingresar al Portal de Padres para completar una solicitud en línea, o haga clic

font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: para obtener información adicional. Comuníquese con Paul Todd, Administrador Comercial, a

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: o 609-443-7717, ext. 2028, con cualquier pregunta sobre el proceso.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px
line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Cómo se compartió anteriormente, la interpretación actual de nuestra estructura de aprendizaje remoto se deriva de la póliza relacionada con la Instrucción en el Hogar. Por lo tanto, las expectativas son que los estudiantes estén presentes todos los días, y se utilizara evidencia de finalización del trabajo para confirmar esa asistencia. Sin embargo, reconocemos que habrá días en que los estudiantes estén enfermos y no puedan completar el trabajo asignado por su maestro. Si esto ocurre, los padres deben usar las pestañas "Asistencia" y "Notificar a la Oficina de Asistencia" a través del Portal de Padres para enviar la asistencia de su hijo. Si los padres requieren ayuda, comuníquese con la escuela de su hijo o la oficina de su grado. Haga clic

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #1155cc; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: underline; -webkit-text-decoration-skip: none; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: para obtener información adicional.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0.0001pt; color: #222222; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: normal; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; padding: 0px
line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Debido al cierre de las escuelas por el COVID-19, nuestra facultad y el personal brindarán instrucción, asesoramiento, enfermería y servicios relacionados a través de sesiones de videoconferencia en línea en tiempo real. Esta plataforma permite a los estudiantes recibir servicios e instrucción al conectar a los maestros/personal y estudiantes a través de medios electrónicos o virtuales. El método de esta instrucción/estos servicios se proporcionará a grupos de estudiantes, generalmente en la clase habitual de su hijo, donde otros estudiantes podrán participar en la instrucción y podrán ver/escuchar la interacción entre otros estudiantes. Aunque desaconsejamos que los padres/tutores supervisen esta instrucción, comprenda que existe la posibilidad de que los padres/tutores puedan ignorar nuestra dirección. Además, la grabación/tomar imágenes de la instrucción en tiempo real a través de videoconferencia por estudiantes y padres/tutores, sin la aprobación previa por escrito del distrito escolar, está estrictamente prohibida. Debido a las limitaciones actuales impuestas por el reciente cierre de la escuela relacionado con COVID-19, creemos que hay beneficios significativos con respecto al uso de la instrucción/reuniones de videoconferencia en tiempo real para abordar las necesidades de nuestros estudiantes. Esperamos sinceramente, considerando nuestro cierre actual de la escuela, que su hijo pueda participar en videoconferencias en tiempo real para recibir instrucción, asesoramiento, enfermería y servicios relacionados, y beneficiarse de una conexión virtual con sus maestros, terapeutas y personal de la escuela. Sin embargo, si no desea que su hijo participe en esta forma de instrucción, asesoramiento, enfermería y/o terapia, notifique al distrito haciendo clic
